医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
投资青少年心理健康可带来长期经济和社会效益研究表明，支持青少年心理健康是一项具有成本效益的投资，可以改善经济成果并减轻财政压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Investing-in-adolescent-mental-health-delivers-long-term-economic-and-social-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Investing-in-adolescent-mental-health-delivers-long-term-economic-and-social-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be02e617-3eec-4863-97e8-ba4744d8bf70 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 05:38:00 -0500 Investing in adolescent mental health delivers long-term economic and social benefits
视网膜血管特征被确定为中风风险的潜在预测因素研究人员确定了视网膜脉管系统的具体特征如何帮助预测个体中风的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Retinal-angio-features-identified-as-潜在-predictors-of-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Retinal-angio-features-identified-as-潜在-预测者-of-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=058ae169-c996-49cf-a139-3fd407d57e07 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 04:52:00 -0500 Retinal vascular features identified as potential predictors of stroke risk
新研究发现大脑神经元驱动脂肪和糖的消耗研究人员发现了背侧 HPC 内不同的神经元群，这些神经元群对某些营养物质有反应并影响肥胖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-study-uncovers-brain-neurons-driven-fat-and-sugar-conspiration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/New-study-uncovers-brain-neurons-driven-fat-and-sugar-conclusion.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ec57d70a-c008-42c5-9274-0c4f0c4b6c0c Mon, 20 Jan 2025 04:37:00 -0500 New study uncovers brain neurons driving fat and sugar consumption
通过人工智能驱动的模拟重新思考心理健康研究最近的研究强调了生成代理在模拟复杂的社会环境相互作用、改变心理健康研究和干预措施方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Rethinking-mental-health-research-through-AI-driven-simulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Rethinking-mental-health-research-through-AI-driven-simulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7da792a7-c99a-40bc-9ab8-4ac13804deb7 Mon, 20 Jan 2025 04:13:00 -0500 Rethinking mental health research through AI-driven simulations
抗组胺药为红细胞生成性原卟啉症相关肝病带来新希望氯环利嗪有望减少红细胞生成性原卟啉症中原卟啉 IX 的积累和肝损伤，并针对组胺途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Antihistamines-offer-new-hope-for-erythropoietic-protoporphyria-lated-liver-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250120/Antihistamines-offer-new-hope-for-erythropoietic-protoporphyria-lated-liver-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b09ce99-ca9b-4413-9dcf-c62cc0a34eac Mon, 20 Jan 2025 03:39:00 -0500 Antihistamines offer new hope for erythropoietic protoporphyria-related liver disease
怀孕会引发深刻的大脑变化，增强母性本能和心理健康一项开创性的研究表明，怀孕会导致灰质体积呈 U 形模式，这是由荷尔蒙变化驱动的，并与母性依恋有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Pregnancy-triggers-profound-brain-changes-enhancing-maternal-instincts-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Pregnancy-triggers-profound-brain-changes-enhancing-maternal-instincts-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ca31f16-0949-4c0a-b87f-036a415c2150 Sun, 19 Jan 2025 23:00:00 -0500 Pregnancy triggers profound brain changes, enhancing maternal instincts and mental health
科学家揭示直立人一百万年前就掌握了沙漠生存能力研究人员发现，一百万年前，直立人就适应了坦桑尼亚的极度干旱条件，这挑战了之前关于早期人类生态限制的信念。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Scientists-reveal-Homo-erectus-mastered-desert-survival-one-million-years-ago.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Scientists-reveal-Homo-erectus-mastered-desert-survival-one-million-years-ago.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83ef3eec-b602-4701-b5b2-5557b79ea2e8 Sun, 19 Jan 2025 22:31:00 -0500 Scientists reveal Homo erectus mastered desert survival one million years ago
研究人员利用蚊子交配传播抗疟疾真菌研究人员开发出了转基因真菌，可以杀死通过性传播传播疟疾的蚊子，为针对室内和室外人群提供了一种有希望的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Researchers-utilize-mosquito-mating-to-spread-malaria-fighting-fungi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Researchers-utilize-mosquito-mating-to-spread-malaria-fighting-fungi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ca74d8e-6f63-41ce-8d34-57cda5755e56 Sun, 19 Jan 2025 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers utilize mosquito mating to spread malaria-fighting fungi
COMET 模型通过深度学习增强疾病预测研究人员开发了 COMET，这是一个深度学习框架，利用电子健康记录和组学数据来改进预测模型并揭示生物学见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/COMET-model-enhances-disease-prediction-with-deep-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/COMET-model-enhances-disease-prediction-with-deep-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f5fbda3-93f5-4532-a029-35173535226f Sun, 19 Jan 2025 21:27:00 -0500 COMET model enhances disease prediction with deep learning
麦卢卡蜂蜜与奥伊亚乐华蜂蜜：研究揭示了关键的抗氧化差异和健康益处研究比较了麦卢卡蜂蜜（MH）和奥伊亚乐华蜂蜜（OLH）的抗氧化特性，发现 MH 的酚类含量高出十倍，而 OLH 通过减少氧化应激和增强抗氧化能力而表现出卓越的体内抗氧化活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Manuka-vs-Ohia-Lehua-honey-Study-reveals-key-antioxidant-differences-and-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Manuka-vs-Ohia-Lehua-honey-Study-reveals-key-antibiotic-differences-and-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c093ca1-a03a-497b-be24-8512b8311f5c Sun, 19 Jan 2025 16:37:00 -0500 Manuka vs. Ohia Lehua honey: Study reveals key antioxidant differences and health benefits
